summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Colorado Avenue, from West Alaska Street to a point 750 feet, more or less, north of the north line thereof; by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 12624 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
